verses.verse: עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> By נַהֲר֨וֹת ׀ <S%H5104><s%> By the rivers בָּבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> There יָ֭שַׁבְנוּ <S%H3427><s%> there we sat down גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again בָּכִ֑ינוּ <S%H1058><s%> yea we wept בְּ֝זָכְרֵ֗נוּ <S%H2142><s%> when we remembered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> Zion
עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon עֲרָבִ֥ים <S%H6155><s%> upon the willows בְּתוֹכָ֑הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst תָּ֝לִ֗ינוּ <S%H8518><s%> We hanged כִּנֹּרוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H3658><s%> our harps

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For שָׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> there שְֽׁאֵל֪וּנוּ <S%H7592><s%> required שׁוֹבֵ֡ינוּ <S%H7617><s%> For there they that carried us away captive דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> act שִׁ֭יר <S%H7892><s%> us [one] of the songs וְתוֹלָלֵ֣ינוּ <S%H8437><s%> and they that wasted שִׂמְחָ֑ה <S%H8057><s%> us [required of us] mirth שִׁ֥ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> [saying] Sing לָ֝֗נוּ מִשִּׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> of the songs צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion

אֵ֗יךְ <S%H349><s%> How נָשִׁ֥יר <S%H7891><s%> How shall we sing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁיר־ <S%H7892><s%> song יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S עַ֝֗ל <S%H5921><s%> and אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> land נֵכָֽר׃ <S%H5236><s%> in a strange
אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֶשְׁכָּחֵ֥ךְ <S%H7911><s%> If I forget יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> thee O Jerusalem תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <S%H7911><s%> forget יְמִינִֽי׃ <S%H3225><s%> let my right hand

תִּדְבַּ֥ק־ <S%H1692><s%> cleave לְשׁוֹנִ֨י ׀ <S%H3956><s%> thee let my tongue לְחִכִּי֮ <S%H2441><s%> to the roof of my mouth אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֪א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶ֫זְכְּרֵ֥כִי <S%H2142><s%> If I do not remember אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אַ֭עֲלֶה <S%H5927><s%> if I prefer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> not Jerusalem עַ֝֗ל <S%H5921><s%> Above רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> above my chief שִׂמְחָתִֽי׃ <S%H8057><s%> joy

זְכֹ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> Remember יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD לִבְנֵ֬י <S%H1121><s%> the children אֱד֗וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom אֵת֮ <S%H853><s%> י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day יְֽרוּשָׁ֫לִָ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem הָ֭אֹ֣מְרִים <S%H559><s%> who said עָ֤רוּ ׀ <S%H6168><s%> Rase עָ֑רוּ <S%H6168><s%> [it] rase עַ֝֗ד <S%H5704><s%> very הַיְס֥וֹד <S%H3247><s%> [it even] to the foundation בָּֽהּ׃

בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter בָּבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon הַשְּׁד֫וּדָ֥ה <S%H7703><s%> who art to be destroyed אַשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> happy שֶׁיְשַׁלֶּם־ <S%H7999><s%> [shall he be] that rewardeth לָ֑ךְ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּ֝מוּלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1576><s%> the recompense שֶׁגָּמַ֥לְתְּ <S%H1580><s%> have repaid לָֽנוּ׃

אַשְׁרֵ֤י ׀ <S%H835><s%> Happy שֶׁיֹּאחֵ֓ז <S%H270><s%> [shall he be] that taketh וְנִפֵּ֬ץ <S%H5310><s%> and dasheth אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֝לָלַ֗יִךְ <S%H5768><s%> thy little ones אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> Against הַסָּֽלַע׃ <S%H5553><s%> against the stones
